data.name: MAGIX Video deluxe 2019 Plus Steam Edition
data.detailed_description:
Want to bring your gaming videos to the next level? Video Deluxe 2019 Plus - Steam Edition makes it easy! An extensive range of features make the Plus version the essential program for editing your videos.

Faster, more precise video editing

With hardware acceleration that now works twice as fast as before, video editing is faster and video export simpler than ever before. Ultra-precise editing tools also help to speed up your editing workflow – in particular due to the new feature for moving object content instead of cutting it. This enables you to find the most action-packed scenes by intuitively scrubbing through footage.

Everything you need for the perfect look

Whether you're stabilizing distorted recordings with Mercalli V2 image stabilization, using the simplified multicam editing or spicing up your most action-laden moments with new effects, you can let your creativity run wild – and benefit all the while from a user-friendly interface.Access high-performing functions at the highest level of quality.

Highlights

  • Up to 1,500 unique effects including special effects
  • NEW! Create videos twice as fast – with 2x faster hardware acceleration
  • Smooth proxy editing up to 4K
  • NEW! Chapter export – easily export individual chapters instead of the entire video
  • NEW! Active destination track for precise insertion of videos, effects and music
  • proDAD Mercalli V2 image stabilization
  • Automatic shot match
  • Multicam and 360° editing

data.short_description: For better videos in outstanding quality: Video Deluxe 2019 Plus – Steam Edition transform recordings your recordings into gameplay videos that will get everyone's attention.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard, minimum resolution 1280 x 768
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal sound card
  • Additional Notes: Supported import formats Video: (DV-)AVI, HEVC/H.265*, M(2)TS, MJPEG, MKV, MOV, MPEG-1/2/4, MXV, VOB, WMV(HD) Audio: MIDI, MP3, OGG, Surround sound/5.1, WAV, WMA Image: BMP, GIF, JPEG, TGA, TIF Supported export formats Disc: DVD, Blu-ray Disc, AVCHD disc Video: (DV-)AVI, HEVC/H.265*, MJPEG, MOV, MPEG-1/2/4, MXV, WMV(HD) Audio: MP3, Surround sound/5.1, WAV Image: BMP, JPEG *HEVC encoding requires fee-based activation. MP3 export requires installation of Windows Media Player Version 10 or higher.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 | 8 | 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated, at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Multi-channel sound card recommended for surround sound editing
  • Additional Notes: Some advanced program functions demand more of your computer's processing power. To get the most from these functions, your system should at least meet the recommended requirements. Check your operating system’s control panel for technical information about your computer.
